scenes.text:
The Taylor Swift Society brings together all fans that get together and have a marvelous time! Be it putting on our detective glasses to figure out Easter eggs and digging for the number 13 in music videos or coming together to just dance to the hits, we have it all to offer! 

We’re happy, free, confused and lonely at the same time and would love to welcome you to our little committee so if this is something you are interested in, put on your cowboy boots and jump head first, fearless!

We have regular study sessions at 6-8 pm on every other tuesday, but other than that we don't have a specific day for more 'taylor-ed' events, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our Instagram.
Our membership is £5.00 for the year!
We host a variety of socials. For full details, have a look at our social media pages.
